actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-946.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 191 - 120 (Record Vote No: 432).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5133) to establish domestic content requirements for motor vehicles sold in the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5133 (Domestic content requirements for motor vehicles sold in the United States).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5133) to establish domestic content requirements for motor vehicles sold in the United States, and for other purposes.
